value:
No weapon, divine or not, offers
more comfort than the presence
of one's companions.

I can remember the day I began
to stand up for peace in Altea as
if it occurred yesterday.

If I am to don this garb, I must
approach battle in a way that
will honor the legend of Anri.

There are many relics known as the
Fire Emblem across the different
worlds... Could this be coincidence?

I've been saved by Caeda's kindness
countless times. She is irreplaceable.
I could not do without her.

I am Marth, prince of Altea. I come
bearing a symbol of your lasting bond
with $Nf.

My companions push me onward.
They are what keep me going.

If bringing the battle to an end will
take us closer to peace, I will waste
no time hesitating.

If my sister were to see me like
this, I would never forgive myself.

Your faith in me gives me strength.
I will not disappoint you!

I am Marth, prince of Altea. I can
see from the look in your eye that
your resolve is unmatched.$k$pI will aid you in your campaign
for peace.

I can still remember the feeling
in my hands when I first took
up a sword...$k$pIt was so heavy, so sharp...dangerous!
I felt so helpless, wondering if I could
ever manage to use such a blade.$k$pBut since then, I have swung a sword
thousands, no...tens of thousands of
times, I'm sure.$k$pI use it for the sake of my people
and their future. For those yet
to come.$k$pIt is because of the support people
have given me that I am where
I am today.$k$pI want to live up to their faith in me,
and repay that support somehow.$k$pThat is how I wield my blade.$k$pAs long as I have something I must
protect, I will likely continue to do so,
with an eye toward a brighter future.
たあっ
決める！
ああっ…
まだだ…！
For the hope of all.
A single strike!
Believe in me!
Victory is ours!
I can't give up now...
Laugh...
These clothes are those of Altea's first king, King Anri.
Hey, woah there. You always do that. I'm catching on.
Artemis and Anri could never be together. What a sad story.
Anri won his battle all alone. I, on the other hand, rely on the strength of my friends.
There are so many that believe in me, and nothing could make me happier.
I can overcome any difficulty with my friends beside me.
As long as I am with you, we will never lose. I wish to continue fighting at your side.
Yes?
Hmm...
I believe in you.
